response.overview: If the spiritual nature that we carry with us isn't first and foremost in our lives, then I don't think our priorities are correct. — Bronco Mendenhall BYU Head Coach, Bronco Mendenhall, along with coaches and players from the 2006 Mountain West Championship team, talks about the importance of getting back to a the winning tradition, seeking the Spirit, and living honorably — three keys that have helped return success to the BYU football program.
response.title: Tradition, Spirit, Honor
